extendedInfo.description: New version AoD Online is now available: http://goo.gl/ckVOCiAge of Darkness (AoD) is a combination of the tower defense and real-time strategy video game developed and published by DivMob. To assure victory, the player must gather resources in order to pay for new units, buildings and more advanced technology.Single-player campaigns is in which the player is required to complete specific objectives and protect their Main House.Endless mode is in which player have to stay alive as long as possible.Multiplayer mode allow player enjoy with their friends via wifi network.Technology is researched at specific items. Technological advances come in many categories, such as military upgrades (better arms and hp units), economic upgrades (increasing the efficiency of resource gathering), and infrastructure upgrades (more resilient buildings). As basic technology research is completed, more advanced technologies may become available.The Main House is the most important buildings in the game. Player have to protect from enemies attack and here advancement is researched. Beside the Main House, player have to build Barracks, Archery Range and Stables to create Footmen, Archer and Horsemen to protect Main House.

reviews.title: miserable and waste of time
reviews.comment: rubbish. i cant even open the game without it force closing. i dont think it is that good anyway from the comments on this game. it doesn\'t even load the \"d\" on the loading screen.
reviews.author: jack pullen

reviews.title: Wow...
reviews.comment: At first I thought this would be great but after playing it I\'m seeing its wack. How you supposed to progress if you can only do everything one at a time (build, gather resources, populate) That definitely needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: gregory paulling

reviews.title: This game is fun
reviews.comment: Idk what u guys r complaining about but this game is fun im about 12 lvls in without having to pay
reviews.author: Bernard Therrien

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Cannot get past the sixth level unless you pay for upgrades using real cash. Otherwise the game was only half decent.
reviews.author: Carl Gu

reviews.title: Needs a re-think
reviews.comment: Constant \"go\" sound effect is annoying. There is no need for resource gathering if you can literally just tap on trees and mines etc. Most things are predefined too, so you don\'t have much choice...
reviews.author: Chaz Dunn

reviews.title: Swindlers!
reviews.comment: This game was great until level 6 where they make it impossible to beat and are basically trying to make you spend money in the game. For people that actually have intelligence and see what you\'re trying to pull it\'s insulting!
reviews.author: Skyler Summers

reviews.title: Requires spending money to upgraded units in order to pass Level 7
reviews.comment: It is ridiculous the difficulty spike between the first 5 levels to the 6th and 7th. I just barely managed to scrape by level 6 and level 7 is just a joke to even attempt. It would be helpful to have alternate methods to gain and unlock upgrades other than just the stars given the difficulty of them. Perhaps a coin system in which you can replay a level and accumulate a currency to buy unit upgrades.
reviews.author: Haakon Sande

reviews.title: Fun multiplayer, crap single player
reviews.comment: The single player is near impossible to make any progress at all on after level 6 or 7. They want you to buy currency to be able to advance. Multiplayer can be fun for awhile though, gets boring quickly.
reviews.author: Zack Hider
